stadium.name: The Serpent's Pass
stadium.location: Zmeigorod, just west of the lumber mill
stadium.description: Has to be periodically rebuilt whenever the old stadium starts sinking into the swamp. Don‚Äôt worry about it.

stats.pregame_ritual: Rubbing a foul-smelling local mushroom on their elbows for flexibility.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Polishing their helmet with a live snail for good luck.
Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Looking each teammate in the eye and giving a single, firm nod.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Painting a single, matching stripe of mud on each player's face.

stadium.name: The Old Fort
stadium.description: The team plays within the crumbling, stone-ringed ruins of an ancient hill-fort. The 'runes' are just old, weathered carvings on the standing stones that serve as obstacles.

stats.pregame_ritual: Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Spitting into their own hand and then slapping their face with it.
Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
A toast of goat's milk to the health of their rivals.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.

preGame:
Hello out there in Trollball land! This is your favorite demon of the airwaves, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live from the soggy, sinking spectacle of **The Serpent's Pass**! üèüÔ∏è Gee whillikers, folks, you can practically hear the stadium groaning as it settles into the swamp, but that won't stop the heart-pounding action of Game 2 in this Losers Bracket playoff series! The **Zmeigorod Snessengers** are up 1-0 in this Best-of-3, and the energy here is absolutely electric‚Äîmostly because the fans are terrified the floor will give way! 

Our home team, the Snessengers, are the darlings of the realm right now! I haven't seen this much green in the stands since High Priestess Oona decided to stop showering! üêç I just saw **Evalyn Pierrepont** polishing his helmet with a live snail for good luck‚Äînow that's the kind of slimy dedication that wins championships! And let‚Äôs not forget **Delija Dowling**, who just downed a raw egg, shell and all, right in front of the press box. Talk about a crunch! They‚Äôre looking to sweep the series and send the Runeguard packing to the abyss!

But wait just a minute! The **Kerlauger Runeguard** aren't going down without a fight, even if nobody in the stands is cheering for them! üõ°Ô∏è **Lashondra Niehaus** is looking particularly fierce today; she just had a teammate punch her in the shoulder so hard I think I saw a tooth fly out! That‚Äôs the spirit! Meanwhile, **Harilda Sigsmond** is leading the team in a chant that‚Äôs actually drowning out the sound of the **Sudden Downpour** beginning to lash the field. Can the Runeguard overcome the **Altitude Sickness** and the sheer popularity of their rivals to force a Game 3? Grab your umbrellas and your spiked brass knuckles, because the opening whistle is about to blow! It‚Äôs time for Trollball! üéôÔ∏è‚ú®
postGame:
Holy cow! What a turn of events here at the Serpent's Pass! I hope you didn't bet your soul on a sweep, because the **Kerlauger Runeguard** just absolutely dismantled the Snessengers with a 4-0 shutout! üõ°Ô∏è It was a masterclass in defensive brutality and opportunistic scoring that has completely silenced this swampy stadium. The Snessengers might have the fans, but the Runeguard had the scimitars and the spite today, folks! 

The match started as a real scramble in the mud! **Lorilee Aldred** snatched that troll head up in Center Field like a hungry wolf, setting the tone early. We saw some misses from both sides as they adjusted to the **Sudden Downpour**, with **Johnna Beetner** and **Delija Dowling** both failing to find the hoop from a distance. But the Runeguard were just warming up their killing machines!

Around the midpoint of the first half, the deadlock finally broke. **Johnna Beetner**, clearly tired of the Snessengers' aggressive posing, took the ball deep into Home Field and buried a shot right through the basket! ü•Ö 1-0 for the visitors! But they weren't done. Just moments later, **Shepperd Trefler**‚Äîwho had earlier blocked a tackle from Northway Orran like he was swatting a fly‚Äîfired off a laser from Center Field that found the mark! 2-0! The Runeguard were rolling while the Snessengers were sinking!

And then, my friends, the real fun began‚Äîthe violence! **Lashondra Niehaus** decided that **Avaria Revell** didn't need to be upright anymore and delivered a tackle that echoed through the pass, sending Avaria straight to the healer‚Äôs tent with a nasty injury! üí• It was a beautiful sight, better than any sunset over the Ebon Gate. The Snessengers tried to pass their way out of trouble, but **Delija Dowling** fumbled a pass into the muck just as the halftime whistle blew.

After the break, the Runeguard turned the brutality up to eleven. It was like a revolving door at the healer's tent for Zmeigorod! **Lashondra Niehaus** was back at it, taking out **Northway Orran**, and then **Lon Gabriell** absolutely leveled **Gere Cordelie**. I haven't seen this much carnage since Sir Artorias tried to 'negotiate' with a dragon! üêâ The Snessengers were being picked apart limb by limb!

**Johnna Beetner** wasn't content with just scoring; she went back for seconds on **Avaria Revell**, injuring the poor soul again! Then **Gurney Fadiman** got in on the action, putting **Dare Wynnie** out of commission. It was a total collapse of the Zmeigorod front line. Even **Arni Griffith**, with all his 'heroic backstories' for the ball, couldn't find a happy ending today. He tried to throw a pass, but it was snatched right out of the air by **Lorilee Aldred**! Intercepted! üèà

The Snessengers' **Rose Kluge** and **Kleinstein MacGregor** tried to make some late-game runs, showing some of that Zmeigorod grit, but they were met with a wall of Runeguard steel. **Lorilee Aldred** put the final exclamation point on the defensive dominance by injuring **Rose Kluge** in the closing minutes. The Snessengers were left dazed, confused, and probably a little bit drowned in the marsh water.

You have to laugh at the 'heroes' of The Grove today. Valos the Eternal might be the Bog Queen, but her subjects looked more like bog-Standard practice dummies out there! üê∏ The Runeguard showed that it doesn't matter how many snails you rub on your helmet if you can't stop a spiked gauntlet to the face. They played like demons possessed‚Äîand I should know!

With this 4-0 victory, the Kerlauger Runeguard have officially tied this Best-of-3 series at 1-1! üõ°Ô∏è We are heading to a winner-takes-all Game 3! The Snessengers will need to find a way to stop the bleeding‚Äîliterally‚Äîif they want to advance. The fans are heading for the exits, wading through the rising swamp water in stunned silence.

Final score: **The Kerlauger Runeguard 4, The Zmeigorod Snessengers 0**. What a comeback! What a slaughter! I‚Äôve been your announcer, Nok the Corrupter, and I cannot wait to see who survives the final showdown. 

Remember, if you‚Äôre heading to Imra‚Äôs bar to drown your sorrows, make sure you pay your tab or you might end up as the next Trollball! Stay wicked, Osterra! üéôÔ∏èüíÄ
